p: EFA oil has been approved by the Brazilian Health Regulatory Agency (ANVISA) as a curative/dressing; however, no scientific literature is available for public consult regarding its safety. A few articles exist on the use of EFA on skin wounds in rats [ 50â€“ 52], lambs [ 53] and human patients [ 22], but none of these evaluated local or serum changes in the cytokines involved in the wound healing cascade. Two review articles stated that no contraindications exist for directly applying EFA oil to a wound surface [ 28, 54], but both articles lacked information regarding the systemic effects. Further studies should be performed in humans to address the potential systemic effects of this oil.
